long_description: Wall map of Idaho features gradation coloring representing changes in altitude and three-dimensional shading for relief. Topographic map, 1:500,000 scale, contour intervals are 500 feet, and in color to easily notice difference in elevations; one inch equals eight miles. Raven Maps and Images; copyright 1987. Measures 64 x 42 inches. Although there is amazing detail, the map remains completely uncluttered when viewed from more than a few feet away. Whether displayed in a home, school or office, these maps are sure to attract attention; the perfect gift.
short_description: Wall map of Idaho features gradation coloring representing changes in altitude and three-dimensional shading for relief.
